file_content.text: Stop! I--I'm sorry, I made a mistake! I tried to get through the tomb, but there were just too many shyrack. I barely escaped.
I figured better to ambush you and take your shards. But I see that's just as futile.
You should have known better. I'm way out of your league.
You didn't stand a chance.
You show great fortitude. It took guts to face me.
It was a valiant try.
You give me more credit than I deserve.
It was a shameless attempt. You have a coward's heart.
You're pathetic.
I was desperate.
Vemrin is already inside with Baras, all the other acolytes died. You were my only chance.
Now I'm doomed, I'll never become Sith. Unless I return with the shards, Baras will have me killed.
Why don't you flee, get off the planet, give up trying to be Sith?
You could run.
You can't get off Korriban without official clearance. I might be able to hide in the Wilds, but I wouldn't survive long.
Then be a man and try to get the shards again.
Go back to the tomb.
I--I can't go back in there. I just can't.
I've heard of a mad hermit in one of the tombs who welcomes failures from the trials. Maybe I'll... seek him out.
I'll save Baras the trouble of listening to your whimpering. Die!
I'll handle that. [Kill him]
I don't want to die!
Take my shards to Baras as your own. I'll get more.
Take mine. [Give shards]
Really? You--you're giving me your shards? Thank you! I--what can I do to repay you?
You are now in my debt.
You'll owe me.
That's for certain. You've got yourself an ally for life.
Nothing. Just do me a favor and keep this between us.
It's a gift. Between friends.
Are you kidding? I won't breathe a word!
Pay me.
Here, absolutely, take it all. It's yours.
Good luck going back into the tomb for another set of shards. I'll see you in Lord Baras's chamber.
You--you did it, didn't you? You got the shards from the tomb, and you're on your way back to Lord Baras.
Are you here to congratulate me?
What are you, an admirer?
Of course I did.
That's all I needed to hear.
I don't have time for this.
I'll take that as a "yes."
You might want to turn around and vacate this particular room.
Man, are you lost.
